committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To amend the Act of May 17, 1954, relating to the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial, to eliminate the acreage limitation on park extension, to allow the acquisition of State lands by means other than donation, to authorize increased funding for land acquisition for the East Saint Louis portion of the Memorial, and for other purposes.
short_title: Jefferson National Expansion Memorial Amendments Act of 1989

summary.text: Jefferson National Expansion Memorial Amendments Act of 1989 - Amends Federal law to eliminate acreage limitations on the expansion of the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial in East Saint Louis, Illinois. Authorizes the acquisition of Illinois State lands through means other than by donation. Repeals the requirement for the Secretary of the Interior's approval of a development and management plan for the East Saint Louis, Illinois, portion of the Memorial. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Jefferson National Expansion Memorial Amendments Act of 1989

To amend the Act of May 17, 1954, relating to the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial, to eliminate the acreage limitation on park extension, to allow the acquisition of State lands by means other than donation, to authorize increased funding for land acquisition for the East Saint Louis portion of the Memorial, and for other purposes.
